name: subspecialist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a doctor who has special training in and knowledge of a particular aspect (= part) of a larger area of medicine: She is a subspecialist in reproductive medicine. Primary care providers often decide whether to refer patients to a sub-specialist.
More examplesFewer examplesThe course will deal with some of the issues that a subspecialist in paediatrics might face.This book should appeal to a wide range of readers, from medical students to subspecialists.A subspecialist may be helpful in diagnosing and managing patients with heart problems.Children with the most complex of medical problems may need subspecialist attention.
